name: Hamburger
description: A hamburger is an extremely popular sandwich consisting of one or more meat patties placed in a bun or a bread roll.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pepperoni pizza is an American pizza variety which includes one of the country's most beloved toppings.

name: Carbonara Pasta
description: The carbonara we know today is prepared by simply tossing spaghetti with guanciale (cured pork jowl), egg yolks, and Pecorino Romano cheese.
